text: Kjersti Døvigen (born 27 June 1943) is a Norwegian actress. She is known, among other things, for her role in the popular Norwegian TV-drama Offshore. Døvigen is the mother of the actress Ulrikke Hansen Døvigen, and currently lives in England. ==Selected filmography== * Life and Death (1980) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian film actresses Category:Norwegian television actresses
title: Kjersti Døvigen
